text: Alcides Ghiggia (22 December 1926 - 16 July 2015) was a former Uruguayan- Italian football player. He has played for Uruguay national team and Italy national team. Ghiggia died on 16 July 2015 at his home in Las Piedras, Uruguay from a heart attack at the age of 88. ==Club career statistics== :: National Football Teams ::..
